text: Najla Bouden Romdhane (; born 29 June 1958) is a Tunisian geologist, academic and politician. She was the Prime Minister of Tunisia from 29 September 2021 to 2 August 2023. She was the first female prime minister in the Arab world. She was Minister for Higher Education in 2011. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Tunisia Category:Tunisian academics Category:Geologists
title: Najla Bouden Romdhane
